UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the amino acid sequence of the UniProt entry.

Literature.Title: Antimicrobial Activity of Small Synthetic Peptides Based on the Marine Peptide Turgencin A: Prediction of Antimicrobial Peptide Sequences in a Natural Peptide and Strategy for Optimization of Potency.
Literature.Author: Hansen IKØ, Lövdahl T, Hansen KØ, Simonovic D, Andersen AJC, Devold H, Richard CSM, Andersen JH, Strøm MB, Haug T

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Human melanoma A2058(no activity data),Bacillus megaterium(MIC=1.0µg/ml),Bacillus subtilis ATCC 23857(MIC=3.9µg/ml),Corynebacterium glutamicum ATCC 13032(MIC=2.0µg/ml),Micrococcus luteus(MIC=31.3µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 9144(MIC=125µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=31.3µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=250µg/ml),Aureobasidium pullulans(MIC=15.6µg/ml),Candida albicans ATCC 10231(MIC=31.3µg/ml),Rhodotorula sp.(MIC=15.6µg/ml)
